item.title: [MIT-missing] 07 Potpourri, Q&A
item.description: Potpourri - missing-semester Q&A - missing-semester 1 Daemons Most computers have a series of processes that are always running in the background rather than waiting for a user to launch them and interact with them.

item.title: Install linux in vmware virtual machine
item.description: 本文简单介绍了Linux基本的开发环境配置，基于VMware虚拟机，搭配Ubuntu LTS，借助ssh工具和host机联络，比较舒适 1 安装部署 创建 2G/16G/2 关闭3D/USB3.1/虚拟化/移除打印机 xx72/LA/vmlnx/xx 安装VMTool # extract here # open in terminal # root sudo su # install .
